description:
Welcome to inspiring Europe, where you'll travel to beautiful locations, swim in the Montenegrin resort of Rafailovici, 
visit the beautiful city of Luxembourg, explore fantastic museums, listen to music at a jazz festival, 
see England's famous Stonehenge, and much more! 

Use all your skills and knowledge to complete the mini-games and find all the hidden objects across the diversity of Europe!

The Collector's Edition includes:
- 8 additional locations - find even more items and a fun raccoon!
- 12 challenging bonus puzzles, along with 8 exclusive mini-games!
- An album with exclusive postage stamps
- 20 unique souvenirs from your trip
name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 5 Collector's Edition
